topic_or_construct: Intrinsic motivation to exert cognitive effort
justification: "Prior to the main task, participants completed the Need for Cognition (NFC) scale, an 18-item questionnaire which measures participants' intrinsic motivation to engage in cognitively demanding activities."
"…as well as the behavioral inhibition system / behavioral activation system scales (BIS/BAS; Carver & White, 1994)."
